r.s: Provides a wrapper to the GraphicsMagick library.
r.d: Gmagick is a php extension to create, modify and obtain meta information of images using the GraphicsMagick API. This extension requires GraphicsMagick version 1.2.6+ and PHP 5.1.3+.
r.n: 1. unsharpenMaskImage method and corresponding test added. 2. Updated test for getQuantumDepth 3. Version number updated
